website_summaries.verdict: Simple and functional, these shelves are sturdy and adaptable to most bathroom designs.
pros: Anchored by sturdy screws and made of wood
Customers can choose from 3 color options
Can hold up to 10 pounds each
A subtle addition that won't overwhelm your bathroom
cons: Customers note the instructions aren't necessary nor informative

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: Great purhase, no issues installing and so far so good with durability. Hoping the shelves hold the weight since I wasn't able to find how much weight they're suppose to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Bri7

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly. Incredibly easy to install. Look so great! Exceeded my expectations with quality.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: The installation was really easy and all the needed hardware was included
customer_reviews.text: The shelves arrived undamaged and were packaged very well. The installation was really easy and all the needed hardware was included. The instructions were easy to follow. Each shelf came with its own template, this allowed me to tape each to the wall so I could figure out location and spacing before I marked anything or put holes in the wall. The color of the shelves is exactly as pictured and just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: PGAIGH

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful shelves to creatively display anything your heart desires!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful shelves to creatively display anything your heart desires! These things are beyond aesthetically pleasing. The shelves themselves are quite beautiful, and feel very sturdy. As others have stated, the mounting process can be a bit of a chore. The anchors they provide are flimsy at best, and the directions definitely leave something to be desired. I wouldn't take off a star just because of the mounting process. It really isn't that bad. BUT if you can manage to weather a little bit of mounting grief, the shelves will hang firmly in place, and add a beautiful addition to your wall decor. Definitely would recommend these shelves for anyone wanting to give their wall a wonderful accent!
customer_reviews.author: Luke Marrs

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews that stated the instructions came with a template for each shelf to hang unfortunately that was not the case with mine. The only instructions are very confusing and just pictures not written. The anchors snapped as soon as I placed them in the wall, I'm very disappointed and want to just return at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for bedrooms & living rooms👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: purchased these shelves for our kid's room and we are pleased 👍🏻 my husband installed them and he said they were fairly quick and easy to put up. There is no assembly required. He used a drill but if you don't have a drill a regular nail or a screw will work. The shelves are good quality and they are perfect for pictures frames,books,videogames,or just setting your decor on them(which is what we used them for)
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shelves!
customer_reviews.text: I needed extra storage space in my bathroom and something to fill up the void space above the toilet. These were the perfect solution! The shelves came with mounting hardware, drywall anchors, so you can hang them anywhere. As you can tell from the picture they can hold a significant amount of weight. They're functional, classy and keep everything safe due to the raised sides. I'm so glad i purchased these.
customer_reviews.author: Maandy

customer_reviews.title: They don't hold a lot but they're so cute!
customer_reviews.text: I got these when I re-did my 12 year old's room. She is a reader and needed shelves - I should have definitely paid more attention to the measurements though, because they really do not hold a lot of books. They're also rather narrow so those heavier books like Harry Potter aren't going to stay on. Especially the shortest shelf of the three, it hardly holds anything at all. But they sure look cute and I am glad I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Nice display shelves
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these shelves for a home office because the finish matched my existing desk perfectly and the price was right. Love the contemporary look of the shelves. The installation packet came with a template for each shelf to hang the mounting screws which made installation so easy. The only negative was that one of the shelves was a bit scratched up the on underside. Not very noticeable and once I had it hung up you could not tell at all so I did not bother returning it. I do wish they have made them reversible for hanging so that you had more options but they look great anyways.
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: i ordered these 4 different times. they are the perfect little shelf. just recently, i wanted them in our hallway to put some of my battery operated candles on because it's very dark and i keep tripping over my cat. My husband hung them and they look really cute. each shelf, except the largest hold one candle, the largest hold 2. i'm currently redoing my bedroom and i will get a set when it's done. they are clean looking and sleek but very sturdy. in my dining room i have 6 of them holding Snowbabies. really nice shelves.
customer_reviews.author: americancarol

customer_reviews.title: Be aware these are small for books
customer_reviews.text: I like these alright. I wanted them for books and they were really cheap, but I should have paid more attention to how little depth the shelves have. As you can see from my picture, you can get most books on it regardless, but bigger ones — like the Hamilton book in the pic — will simply fall off if traditionally shelved. I don’t regret it, though, which is surprising. It looks nice and is really cheap and still got the job done. Installation was alright, I mean putting up shelves is always going to be an ordeal.
customer_reviews.author: N B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect display shelves!
customer_reviews.text: Don't hesitate - these are worth it! I wanted to match another white shelf (36-inch floating shelf from "AHDECOR", also on Amazon). These are exactly what I needed and the price point is even better! The shelves came with wall anchors and screws, but we used only screws because it's mounted on wood. Total unpackaging/set up time was fast (under five minutes) and my dad was able to mount them easily on the wall. These were noticeably easier to mount than the AHDECOR shelf, and are a better value. I only wish this seller had different styles because I would order more! I definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Good, light, simple; they work
customer_reviews.text: The small one is quite small, but they work very well. For the price, they are quite sturdy and well put together. The routing for mounting is clean, but not reinforced, so don't expect to put anything heavy on it. I ended up drilling a hole in the side of the small one and use it for charging my phone by the bed. The medium and large are holding light weight nick-nacks above my girlfriend's desk.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set for myself for little decorations like my essential oils and decorative standing neons lights and succulents. I haven't put much weight on them but they are perfect for what I use them for. Liked them so much I bought another set for my boyfriend so he can put up some of his video games and drinks. I may buy another set for pictures in my living room!
customer_reviews.author: Emily S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for decor — not a storage solution!
customer_reviews.text: These are great shelves if you plan to use them only to display small, lightweight, knick knacks. As previous reviewers said, the hardware included is trash. I didn’t use the anchors at all, just the screws, and the shelves are sturdy enough to hold a few light items each. If you plan to use these shelves to hold books or other more substantial items, I'd suggest getting different hardware or even just a different product in general. For my purposes, however, these shelves are totally cute and exactly what I was looking for! They’re sleek, minimal, and very aesthetically pleasing. Mine did not come scratched or beat up as some buyer’s had.
customer_reviews.author: Payton Harcum

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: These shelves were exactly what I needed for my tiny bathroom. We don’t have a lot of sink space and I was tired of putting my products around the small sink area. Also my husbands beard trimmings would get all over everything. Now I don’t have to worry about that anymore. They’re cute and easy to install and are sturdy enough for my beauty products. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Lorlee

customer_reviews.title: Near impossible to mount securely.
customer_reviews.text: The included mounting hardware requires a hole in your wall that is rediculously large. Then, it won't stay in the wall! So when you hang the shelf, it flops around! So now we use the shelf to hide the rediculously large holes until we patch them up, repaint and find something nicer to hang. We do not allow anything to be placed on the shelves for fear that they'll tear away from the wall and create a larger mess!
customer_reviews.author: Chad B.

customer_reviews.title: Wont hold anything. Its too narrow. Huge waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This are so narrow they wont hold anything. I cant even keep a small picture frame on there. It will hold a remote or something tiny like that but its not wide enough to hold anything you'd want it to (i.e. a picture frame or a small plant) forget about it holding a cable box or even a tiny amaxon fire box.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Smaller Than Expected, But Still Great
customer_reviews.text: These shelves look amazing above my bureau. The color is nice, the construction is sturdy, and it seems like the screws would pop out of the wall before these shelves would break. The only trouble I have with them is that they're smaller than I expected, so I still have some things decorating my bureau. Other than that, they're a great option.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Trask

customer_reviews.title: flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Theses LOOK nice. BUT, hanging them was hard. once you put the anchor in the screw, it made it too large to fit in the hole in the back of the shelves., they wouldn't stay flat against the wall, and they feel thin. For the price? good. They are hung in the bathroom with a few light weight things, mainly for decoration so they work for me. If i were to be getting stuff off these everyday, i'd expect them to fall in a week.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: Thin shelves that helped me clear off my bathroom counter. Easily holds bottles and jars of things. I store my makeup bag on one as well. I used the template to put it on the wall and didn't have any issues like others did. I even used the hardware included and didn't have any issues. However, I'm not putting anything substantial on them.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisa10

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Finish Shelves
customer_reviews.text: Love these shelves! Made our bathroom look great, and also gave us more storage, and gave the bathroom a fresh finished look! I only have to take on star off because sometimes the screws that were given with the product did not fit the holes exactly on the floating shelves. So my husband had to get different nails to make it work. All in all though this is a great purchase! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Misty Heagney

customer_reviews.title: Comes with Installation cheat sheet.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shelves. Use them for displaying our collectibles and they look great doing it. The fact that they come with sheets of paper with markings to show the exact length between mounting holes on the shelves was just perfect. I suck at measuring and I was able to get all three of these mounted perfectly on the first try thanks to the cheat sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Aldridge

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: Arrived and were the sizes expected. But if this was supposed to have the circled parts, they were missing. Had to go get my own screws (EX6PCS) and wall sinks (DX6PCS). The instructions were all visual, nothing written at all. So if you no experience, you will have to figure it out. Another cheap item, brought to you by Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Shoeprints

customer_reviews.title: Love these shelves
customer_reviews.text: These shelves look amazing and I love them so much. I thought the small one would be too small to put anything but it's quite functional and looks very cute on my wall. I think the best size was the medium one and would love if they sold an option of just that size. I didn't bother with the other anchors that came in the pack like the other reviews recommended and just bought a pack of screws and anchors on amazon that are higher quality and they work perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Instead of nail, I use Command poster strip to ...
customer_reviews.text: Instead of nail, I use Command poster strip to keep them in place, and also can be moved around if needed. I intend to use them for displaying Lego, nothing heavy. So far it works really well. These shelves are handy.
customer_reviews.author: Have a good day

customer_reviews.title: Unlimited design styles!!!
customer_reviews.text: After playing with it for a while, I figure that there are countless of ways you can set these up, whatever fits your style and needs. I chose to set it up next to my door and above my bed where I only place a few objects like my tv remote and my remote for my room lights and my phone or switch. This was the style I chose but there are many styles you can arrange these products by. The red lights strips were also order from amazon. Incase anyone is interested in those.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Buy Command Strips
customer_reviews.text: Whereas the physical shelves look beautiful they do not hang well on the screw they provide for us. Mine literally kept falling off the wall with nothing on it and I followed the directions to a T. I would recommend that you buy command strips. That's what I did and I'm in love. They look Beautiful, and are much more sturdy then when attempting with the included screws.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Cute bathroom addition
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so that my husband could have a place for his growing cologne collection and for his pills. I dont have too much experience with hanging anything on walls, but I was able to hang these for him without trouble using drywall screws. We have used them for over a month and so far no problems!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shelves
customer_reviews.text: I love these shelves!!! I’ll be purchasing many of these for my wall decor. An easy way to find out where to drill is to take some push pins and the length paper, and put the push pins into the dots and then take it back out. Then drill where the holes in the wall are. Super cute shelves
customer_reviews.author: Milner Martin

customer_reviews.title: Came scratched up, but they get the job done.
customer_reviews.text: The quality is as expected for the price, nothing special. But they are overall a great buy if you're just looking for some cheap shelves. Unfortunately, they came pretty scratched up, but I wasn't interested in waiting for a new set to arrive so I just put them up anyway. If you want to be able to put heavy items on I'd recommend buying your own hardware and maybe some supports for underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Miranda

customer_reviews.title: good times
customer_reviews.text: So I have hundreds of books, and I got these to display the books Im currently using for the semester. instead of inside my desk or in the bookshelf in the other room. Now, if you are using this to display other things like makeup and such, they are so very durable, and easy to put up (or so my dad says). But they will not up books that are much bigger than the average penguin book size. I loved this item though, and use the small one to hold makeup stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Manwa Abdelaziz

customer_reviews.title: Great shelves!
customer_reviews.text: When I found myself running out of places to put my ever-growing Funko Pop collection I started looking at floating shelves. I'm glad I happened upon these ones. They're perfect for what I needed. My Pops look really cute on them, hanging above the TV in my living room. Normally I LOATHE hanging things on my wall because I have a tough time getting them straight/level, but the guides that came with these shelves was a HUGE help. Highly recommend. I'll be picking up a second set (and maybe more) for other walls soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kim B.

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good product. I bought these thinking they would be ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good product. I bought these thinking they would be able to hold books and folders. They aren't quite wide enough to do so. I found some uses for these in my bathroom to hold some items. The drywall anchors would be better if they had a lip on them so that they do not go too deep into the wall. Not a bad product for the price though. Would recommend if you need something inexpensive to hold some smaller items.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Booth

customer_reviews.title: Nice shelves for my Gundam collection
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shelves to put my gundams on display and they look awesome. The shelves are overall very good, easy to install and the assembly holes mapping paper that they give is of great help. I bought the white ones which are a little bit costly than the espresso or black ones, but overall satisfied with my purchase- would be buying Again!
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend buying these
customer_reviews.text: The instructions, as other people said, are useless. The template is off, I tried using it at first to know where to put the holes and ended up with way more holes than I should have in my wall. I like the way it looks now that's it's done, but this was a huge pain in the ass so I recommend buying a product that's better quality and comes with instructions that make it easy to install. Works for what I need, which is the only reason I gave it 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Logan

customer_reviews.title: I'm pretty impressed! These shelves are high quality and were ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty impressed! These shelves are high quality and were very easy to install using the built in diagrams and instructions. They are sturdy and hold books or assorted random objects well. I would recommend you have a level handy so that you can ensure they are straight as it can be a little difficult to guess at.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel BosticTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Easy return so it might be worth a shot if ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned this without even removing them from the box. They appeared to be well constructed and were in the size range that I needed, but the wood of the shelf and the plastic trim on the pressboard edge were two different white tones. The edge was a more blue white while the shelf was a more eggshell. It may work in some environments (or with different lighting - we use soft lighting in the 2700K range), but it caught my eye in a way I couldn't stand. Easy return so it might be worth a shot if you love them.
customer_reviews.author: LVNmommy

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Use The Included Hardware
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I recommend these shelves. However, DO NOT use the included hardware. Every last one of the included drywall anchors ended up inside the wall. I used my own, higher quality dry wall anchors but still tried to use the included screws. As you can see in the picture, one of the screws broke as I was screwing it in. Once you get past that, the shelves are pretty nice. They're light and you can arrange them however you want. Also, the included paper template was extremely helpful for guiding where to place the anchors/screws.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These work great in my craft room
customer_reviews.text: These work great in my craft room. I used my own wall plugs to install since the ones provided were too flimsy. Not a big deal. They arrived in good time and look lovely on my wall while being practical. I could see how these shelves would be easy to move (use new wall plugs), should you ever need to adjust their placement. I've already bought 2 sets and am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: L. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I love these little shelves. They look really cute on my wall. I would totally recommend them, Make sure you buy some better anchors if you purchase these. They ones these come with are horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Beals

customer_reviews.title: Drywall anchors not designed well
customer_reviews.text: The wall anchors these came with went directly into the wall when I tried to install the screw portion. I’ve installed many drywall anchors and haven’t had that happen before. Poor design on that part. They look fine, the template worked well, and I ended up getting them to stay with command strips.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: So cute! The dry wall anchors they come with suck so don’t use those. They are a little loose on the wall but as long and you aren’t constantly messing with them it seems fine. Super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shelves, buy new hardware for an easy durable install!
customer_reviews.text: Our purpose for these shelves are to hold children’s books and a few toys. For the money these shelves do the job but the hardware included is not the best quality and I would use your own measurements when mounting, not the included template. I have included a picture of what hardware I picked up at Home Depot. With the new hardware and 15 minutes of your time these are a breeze to install.
customer_reviews.author: ScottyGQ

customer_reviews.title: Nice enough
customer_reviews.text: I knew these would be small when I ordered them so no disappointment there. However the screws ant came with it are very large and even after using the plugs it came with the screws are falling out of the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to install level
customer_reviews.text: Hard to install because the screw depth is too tight to wall or shelf will be loose. The leveling process was tricky also. I wish it would have been easier. Had better shelves before.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good look and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Each shelf comes like monolitic piece, no need to assembly pieces together. The set comes also with hardware for installing and hanging on the wall. It has simple, clean nice look.
customer_reviews.author: M. E.

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Kind of small but just be sure and read the dimensions before purchasing so you know what you're getting. Very easy to install and look fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Owens

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value
customer_reviews.text: I bought these during one of the lightning deals, and they are amazing. I ended up painting the front of them to match my wall which is right next to it, and I think it really tied the whole room together. Thinking about getting another set as well. Unlike some other shelves I've used, the screws which came with these are actually sturdy. For the other shelves on the teal wall, the screws which came with those literally broke off in the stud haha. We had to use our own. The good news with these shelves is, the mounting holes are very large, so any screws really will work.
customer_reviews.author: Dash

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put up!
customer_reviews.text: I bought some similar to these, but chose these because they seemed better & they were! It’s a good quality & it’s pretty simple to put them up. I didn’t have to put much on them, but they hold up on my wall good!
customer_reviews.author: Esperanza Rios

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to install
customer_reviews.text: These shelves mostly suck. They don’t look awesome and installation is a beast. The drywall anchors aren’t strong enough and the shelf just falls off the wall even without anything on it. Also, the paper templates to help with installation aren’t the right size. I don’t recommend anyone buy these. Really terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Richins

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love the simple, yet stylish design. Easy install. Like other reviews, if you plan on putting any significant weight on these, invest in better wall anchors... 4" deep but great for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: January Momma

customer_reviews.title: Great as video game shelf!
customer_reviews.text: I had some trouble with the drywall anchors, but managed to get them in after a few mins. That’s really the only thing close to negative I can say about this product. Great for a small video game collection. I have tons of games but I’m glad I was able to get some up on my wall finally instead of having them stored in boxes. Definitely very sturdy and seems like it can carry a good amount of weight (I’d estimate 10-20 lbs possibly) Will definitely buy more soon. A great buy for an even better price!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but pretty close.
customer_reviews.text: These shelves were packaged very nicely and came very quickly. They aren't "blow your mind" good quality. They lamenent isn't perfect around some of the coners. However, it's hardly noticible.The shelves them selves have a sturdy build, are very easy to install, and are study on the wall. The only thing I noticed and was like "what the heck?" Was that the shelves (I got white) seemed dirty. It wasn't a huge deal. The smudges wiped right off but it was still weird. Over all I'm quite pleased and I probably will repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Surg Family

customer_reviews.title: Great little shelves
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shelves from a different seller and never got them. I liked the way the shelves looked so I decided to order again but through a different seller. I got the shelves today and I'm very pleased with them. I bought them with the intention of displaying some of my vape gear. They work well for what I need them for. Installation was easy, so long as you toss the instructions. I had an issue getting the last long shelf on the wall. It took me a good 3 tries, but I got it to stay eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Eli N.

customer_reviews.title: Not a huge fan
customer_reviews.text: I was not a huge fan of these shelves. They are hard to assemble and do not hold much at all. They hang off the wall on the top part of the shelf and do not sit all the way up against the wall. Save your money and invest in a better product.
customer_reviews.author: AD4

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my sons room. They are super small. Can barely fit anything on them. They were also not very easy to install. I have huge holes on my wall that need to be patched now
customer_reviews.author: JoAnna Carbajal

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Highly impressed with these shelves. The quality is nice, and each shelf came covered in a thin peelable film to protect it during shipping. They are perfect for small knick-knacks or pictures. I also loved that it included premeasured pieces of paper to show how far apart your screws need to be for each shelf size, no measuring needed!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hamm

customer_reviews.title: This was a horrible experience. The dry wall anchors did not work ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a horrible experience. The dry wall anchors did not work at all, 3 of the 6 included anchors just bent while following the limited instructions. Now I have to go out and buy additional anchors just to finish the job.
customer_reviews.author: Steven L. Corbin II

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, flawed instructions/accessories but still easy
customer_reviews.text: Nuce looking shelves but no proper instructions for installation. What size drill bit? Also it shows to NOT use a screw gun and YES use a hammer, then the instructions failed to mention anything about a hammer and expect you to use a screw gun. Damaged my wall twice when the provided screws broke
customer_reviews.author: jayroc

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy enough
customer_reviews.text: Received fairly quickly. Nice color. Was a little tricky to install (although I measured multiple times). Ended up using my hammer to hit the screws (already in the wall) to get the holes to line up. Sturdy enough for my plants. The wall anchors that were provided worked out well, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Wadella Who?

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but not easy to instal
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult to line them up and I hoped they provided some instructions on how to do it. It is sturdy though but not lot of space. Don't hope to put big flower vases on it.
customer_reviews.author: DAmaze

customer_reviews.title: I don't like it
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like it because I bought espresso finish and is not as black as it shows on the pics. It is more like a dark brown color. The pics made look black but it isn't.
customer_reviews.author: Mike & Ana

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Not worth the $.
customer_reviews.text: These shelves are very poor quality. I hung them in our bathroom to help keep our counters clear. We only used them for light bottles and hygiene care such as lotions, glasses, contact solution, deodorant etc. After only a week, the shelves tore through the screws and fell from the wall. Each time we attempted to re-hang them, they tore worse. I do not recommend these shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Decent shelves, color too light
customer_reviews.text: Decent shelves for the price. They did not have an updated photo to show the color. I wanted as close to black as possible and both espresso and walnut looked dark. These are practically light brown and not what I wanted as far as color, but the shelves are light and easy to install with a screwdriver.
customer_reviews.author: Kris L

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I recently placed above my computer desk and it does make the set up I have looked a lot better. It also helped clean up some random nick nacks I wanted to place around my room as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nanashi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These are great and very stylish and super easy to use. One set I ordered was damaged and the seller was eager to help out! Great company and great product.
customer_reviews.author: Irishmegan1995

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The screws they give to assemble are very cheap. I had to use stronger ones. It is a bit difficult to install. The shelves came with some dirt and marks on them even though they were platic wrapped. Nothing to bad though. But for the price and the durability its worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna maloit

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, drill installation
customer_reviews.text: Great display shelves. I used them for action figures because I'm a nerd but you could use it for a lot of small things. Dare I say this in 2019, you may need a handy man for installation.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for movies and bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first set of these to use as bathroom storage. They are the perfect size for shampoos and lotions. I then bought 4 more sets to hold my movies. They're very sturdy, and they come with everything needed to install them.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Never been so happy about a floater
customer_reviews.text: Got these to go with a matching set I bought elsewhere. They are cute, easy to install and get the job done. My only complaint is that I wish there were just a tad deeper, but they are still wonderful shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Aiden McDonough

customer_reviews.title: I was told floating shelves are a nightmare but.
customer_reviews.text: With the guide that comes with these shelves it took me ten minutes to put up and that's with not knowing quite how I wanted them. They are in my bathroom and have lost of little bottles and three small plants on them. They are holding up wonderfully!!!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Madsen

customer_reviews.title: Screw heads all broke off!
customer_reviews.text: The screw heads all broke off and now I have jagged metal stuck in my walls! Dangerous, so someone has to come fix this now. I'm pissed. DO NOT use any hardware that comes with these, it's total garbage!
customer_reviews.author: J Foster

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: They seem very sturdy! I’m using all 6 to hold up books I want to keep (I still haven’t finalized that part haha) to both open up space and to keep them from being stacked incredibly high like before. Really makes it look better and cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: Britt Pimental

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow for much use
customer_reviews.text: These are decent quality for the price and are easy to install. They come with a paper that has the screw hole distances pre-measured for you. HOWEVER, they are incredibly narrow. I bought them to replace a broken bookshelf for my son and they are so narrow they do not even fit chapter books. I really don't know what they might hold beyond keys or trinkets....they don't even hold DVD's. I would not trust these shelves to hold anything fragile, either, as they are not 100% stable when installed. They stay on the wall but jiggle if touched.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Kind of flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Not the easiest to install. The hardware is a bit on the cheap side, the shelves can't carry too much weight either. I was really looking forward to these shelves, but when it came it it looked as it had been previously installed/used. I returned them and am looking for different floating shelves.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: One of the shelf came broke, is not easy to assemble, poor quality material, it is to short, the only good thing that I can say is looks good in a wall as a decor.
customer_reviews.author: Rubiol@

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shelves
customer_reviews.text: Nice shelves for the price. I did purchase heavy duty dry wall anchors at Lowes for under $2 because the ones that came with the shelves seemed cheap. I also added command hooks on the side for my necklaces and hair ties and my bathroom vanity looks so much better without all that clutter!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D.Top Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I do love these but I thought they was longer it was very hard to put my daughter books on them but I got them on there had to put the against the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal hill

customer_reviews.title: More storage
customer_reviews.text: We didn't have alot of room in our bathroom or bathroom vanity. When these arrived I thought they might be a little small, but it turn out that the hold alot
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Help keeping things organized
customer_reviews.text: I love these shelves, they look cute and help keeping things looking clean and organized. I bought two sets, ended up using the big one and the two medium ones for my little makeup corner. The used the other big one and the two small ones on my child’s room.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa Y Quezada

customer_reviews.title: Super easy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I love these shelves! It was super easy to assemble and it looks very stylish. I'm not 100% confident of the sturdiness but I'm only putting light decor on it. I can't wait for my guest to use the bathroom and look at the shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Ji Park

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and look nice!
customer_reviews.text: Hear look great on the wall. Were delivered in good condition. My husband loved that they came with paper guides to help put them up evenly before drilling holes in the wall and no need to mark walls up with pencils and such.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney & Brooks

customer_reviews.title: love these!
customer_reviews.text: these are so cute and they were a great addition to my room. they look amazing, but they are a little bit smaller than I expected...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent shelves, decent price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these to hold some very lightweight decor, they look really nice and they came in nice packaging (no scratches or chips), but during assembly the screws very easily stripped the mounting holes on the shelves themselves, causing them to require a putty filling to get them to mount level. Overall you get what you pay for, decent shelves for a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Skylar Wells

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy. I put these above my bed and put some candles on it. It looks amazing. Very easy to put up. My boyfriend loved them and he hardly liked anything furniture related
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Clean and tidy, practical space savers
customer_reviews.text: Very clean and subtle. I bought these to help store my lotions and perfumes and to keep them out of reach from my toddlers. I'm so glad I chose these as they are the perfect size- clean and tidy looking and don't take up too much space. They also look Very nice above my white vanity mirror desk. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Lucia

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk, but it works fine if you aren’t too picky.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Really cheaply made. Arrived scratched and dirty. Came with mismatched mounting hardware and very poor instructions. Mounting keyholes poorly drilled and not quite level.
customer_reviews.author: Bob "Mad Bomber" Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sturdy but a little awkward to install
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sturdy but a little awkward to install. I found the small shelf in particular had a hard time staying up tight against the wall. Better instructions or screws could be included but if you're crafty/handy, you can make it work with other screws or some creative engineering. They look great!
customer_reviews.author: A. Cat

customer_reviews.title: floating shelves are an art
customer_reviews.text: The smaller shelves stayed up very well. The larger ones started falling within a few months. I did have issues mounting the shelves. My main problem wasn't with the construction of the item it was with floating shelves in general.
customer_reviews.author: Delia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The shelves were easy to hang. It includes a strip of paper for measuring & placement. All the acrylic containers, white shelves, white chair & light mirror are from Amazon. All fabulous products. My daughter loved everything.
customer_reviews.author: NGR

customer_reviews.title: Great for bathrooms!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the black and white sets, but only used the white. They look stylish and great. Only regret is that since they’re white and I stored some bottles on them, they got stained brown. Do not recommend putting spray bottles on the white set. Great otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: c00kie

customer_reviews.title: Floating shelves
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a place to put books to decorate my walls. They came already assembled so I just had to get them hung. For the most part it was pretty easy. The hardest part was figuring out how bill a hole to drill since the instructions are just pics. I also had a problem with one piece wanting to go to far in to the wall. I am wary about putting too much weight on them but overall happy.
customer_reviews.author: Madchessie

customer_reviews.title: Small but nice
customer_reviews.text: Small but nice set. A bit hard to line up properly As a set even with the given guides. Others could just be better at it than i, however.
customer_reviews.author: S Z

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shelves
customer_reviews.text: Although they are not as long as I was expecting as you can see they do hold a good amount of stuff on them. They are easy to assemble and to hang. Great bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Good quality easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Every one saying it's hard to install has never done anything like this before and just doesn't know what their doing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I got this as part of a lightning deal. ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this as part of a lightning deal. Either way, it's hard to complain about anything given the price. However, it did arrive with imperfections, including a scratch on one component and chips on another. But, overall, those are likely to go unnoticed once it's installed on a wall.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen linehan

customer_reviews.title: Timely delivery look beautiful not damaged highly recommend worth the money
customer_reviews.text: A little bit smaller than I expected based on the pictures I didn't look over the dimensions I suppose whenever I looked at the ad however I'm extremely happy with the product and it's very adorable and the delivery was right on time with no damage
customer_reviews.author: Chanel E

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Work well, come with a guide to help you figure out where to drill holes. Works well for CDs and dvds. Will buy more in future
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No extra supplies. Just 6 screws and anchors.
customer_reviews.text: Look exactly as pictured, the smallest one can hold a package of makeup wipes/ baby wipes for size reference. I only wish it came with an extra anchor to the wall/ screw and an extra screw. There are only 6. So there is no room for mistakes.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

product_meta.title: EWEI'S HomeWares WHC1004CD-WH 3 Floating U Shelves-White
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteThis set of 3 U shape display shelves are made of MDF. It's easy to install in a few minutes. You can hang a set of three to create library, display and highlight a favorite collectible. Minor assembly is required. Approximate Dimensions: Large: 17 x 4 x 4". Medium: 13 x 4 x 3. 5". Small: 9 x 4 x 3". Due to monitor variations colors may appear slightly different. Brand: EWEI'S HomeWares
feature_bullets: It is for home, office, dorm, Decorative and functional.
Made of MDF & laminate, it is not real wood, Approximate Dimensions: Large: 17 x 4 x 4". Medium: 13 x 4 x 3. 5". Small: 9 x 4 x 3".
White Finish color to fit any decor, Pls note: Due to monitor variations colors may appear slightly different.
Easy to hang, All hardware included(except hammer and screwdriver).
